A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I debated weather to write a review or not.....as many of the main reasons this film is bad has been covered time and time again...

Poor humour...poor writing....just retcon after retcon of the force awakens...

But Luke's story ark was the killer for me....not just does it ruin this film but it ruins everything tht came before it for me.

unless they remake this onscreen travesty i'm out. we had laughs we had cries i will remember you always Star Wars. but im out.
